title: Add troubleshooting section for safety-net plugin orphaned state
description: Add troubleshooting documentation to istari-setup.md for handling safety-net plugin orphaned state issue with SSL certificate errors

title: Update istari-setup.md to install uncle-bob skill
description: Add skill installation section to istari-setup.md. Create ~/.claude/skills/istari/ directory and copy uncle-bob-clean-code-skill.md to uncle-bob-clean-code.md. Add verification to setup checklist. Test on clean environment.

title: Create istari-review.md command
description: Implement istari-review command to orchestrate PR reviews. Accept PR URL as arg or prompt. Parse GitHub PR URL and fetch metadata via gh CLI. Identify Java files. Run 5 review tools sequentially: /review, /security-review, Superpowers, Compound Engineering, uncle-bob (Java only). Collate all output on screen with clear section headers. No files written.

title: Update README.md with Safety Net documentation
description: Update README.md: add Safety Net to AI Orchestration toolchain list, add to Purpose section (item 4), add troubleshooting section for blocked commands. See design doc: docs/plans/2025-01-05-safety-net-integration-design.md

title: Update istari-setup.md Section 9 summary report for Safety Net
description: Update Section 9 summary report to include Safety Net checks in plugins section, increment TOTAL from 23 to 24, add installation counter check. See design doc: docs/plans/2025-01-05-safety-net-integration-design.md

title: Create istari-upgrade.md command
description: Implement istari-upgrade command with semantic version intelligence. Detect installed versions for all tool types (cargo, npm, brew, claude plugins). Query registries for latest. Parse and compare semantic versions. Categorize as patch/minor/major. Interactive prompts per category. Apply upgrades. Optional lock file snapshot.

title: Integration testing for all new commands
description: Test full workflow: setup → update → upgrade → review. Verify skill installation and invocation works correctly. Test upgrade with different version scenarios (patch/minor/major). Test review with PR containing Java files and without Java files. Verify all commands have clear error messages and confirmations.

title: Add Safety Net installation to istari-setup.md Section 7
description: Add Safety Net plugin installation in Section 7 of istari-setup.md (after Compound Engineering plugin). Includes marketplace add, plugin install, and user prompts. Uses standard mode. See design doc: docs/plans/2025-01-05-safety-net-integration-design.md

title: Add uncle-bob-clean-code-skill.md source file
description: Copy existing uncle-bob-clean-code skill from ~/jacob-dev/.claude/skills/SKILL.md, rename to uncle-bob-clean-code-skill.md, and place in istari repo root. This is the source file that will be distributed to users.

title: Add LICENSE.md with MIT license
description: Create LICENSE.md file containing the MIT license text for the istari project

title: Add CONTRIBUTING.md for open source contributors
description: Create CONTRIBUTING.md based on SmartFix structure but adapted for istari. Remove CLA section (MIT doesn't require CLA). Include: branching strategy, quick start, development workflow, testing guidelines, PR process

title: Create istari-update.md command
description: Implement istari-update command to sync commands and skills from istari repo to target .claude directory. Prompt for target path, validate it's a .claude directory, copy all command files to commands/, copy skill to skills/istari/, re-run istari-setup. Test with multiple target directories.
